DOC.brief_summary: This case-control study investigated B-vitamin and homocysteine in relation to the presence or the absence of type 2 diabetes and clinical signs of polyneuropathy.
DOC.brief_title: B-Vitamins and Polyneuropathy in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Blood samples were collected and clinical investigations were performed at the same time.
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects with or without diabetes. Usage of supplements containing Bvitamins, methotrexate treatment, cerebral or cardiac events in the last three months Liver or renal dysfunction.
